newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico sees 1997 average peso rate at 8.53/dlr.
newsitem.headline: Mexico sees 1997 average peso rate at 8.53/dlr.

text.p: Mexico sees the average the average peso rate in 1997 at 8.53 pesos per dollar, according to Finance Ministry calculations for next year's budget that were presented to Mexico's Congress Thursday.
In the annexes to the budget proposals, the Finance Ministry said it expected 1996 inflation of 26.2 percent.

The document said the Finance Ministry now expected the average foreign exchange rate for the peso in 1996 would be 7.62 pesos per dollar. The government's original average forecast was for 7.7 pesos per dollar.
